body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Prime Fitness. My name is Brian Mitchell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Brian, my name is Janet Davis.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janet. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the security measures at your gym. Can you tell me more about that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Janet. Our gym utilizes state-of-the-art surveillance cameras and access control systems. Could you provide me with your email address for further communication?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's janet.davis@example.com. Also, how many locations does Prime Fitness have in total?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We currently operate in five different locations across the city. Additionally, could you please confirm your date of birth for account verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My date of birth is the twenty-third of March, nineteen eighty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that with me, Janet. I appreciate your time and interest in Prime Fitness. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that answers all my questions for now. Thank you for your help, Brian.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Janet. If you need anything in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
